TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDbCommand implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 代表在連接至資料來源時執行的 SQL 陳述式，而且是由存取關聯式資料庫的 .NET Framework 資料提供者所實作。

span.span: Represents an SQL statement that is executed while connected to a data source, and is implemented by .NET Framework data providers that access relational databases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面可讓繼承的類別來實作命令類別，代表在資料來源執行的 SQL 陳述式。The interface enables an inheriting class to implement a Command class, which represents an SQL statement that is executed at a data source. 如需有關命令類別的詳細資訊，請參閱[執行命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/executing-a-command.md)。For more information about Command classes, see [Executing a Command](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/executing-a-command.md). 應用程式不會建立的執行個體介面直接，但建立可實作類別的執行個體介面。An application does not create an instance of the interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that implements the interface. 類別實作必須實作其所有成員，並通常會定義要新增提供者特有的功能的其他成員。Classes that implement must implement all its members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality. 例如，介面會定義方法。For example, the interface defines the method. 依次類別會繼承這個方法，而且也會定義方法。In turn, the class inherits this method, and also defines the method. ## Examples 下列範例會建立衍生的類別的執行個體， ，和。The following example creates instances of the derived classes, , , and . 此範例會讀取資料，並寫入至主控台。The example reads through the data, writing it to the console. 最後，範例會關閉，然後在。Finally, the example closes the , then the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlCommand Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.para:
若要升級.NET Framework 資料提供者之間的一致性，命名為在表單中繼承的類別其中是統一的前置詞提供給特定的.NET Framework 資料提供者命名空間中的所有類別。例如，是的前置詞類別中命名空間。當您繼承自介面，您應該實作下列建構函式： 項目描述
PrvCommand() 初始化 PrvCommand 類別的新執行個體。
(字串 cmdText) PrvCommand 初始化查詢的文字 PrvCommand 類別的新執行個體。
(PrvConnection 連接中的 字串 cmdText） PrvCommand 初始化以查詢和 PrvConnection 文字 PrvCommand 類別的新執行個體。
字串 cmdText、 PrvConnection 連接 (PrvTransaction 交易） 的 PrvCommand 初始化與文字的查詢、 PrvConnection 和 PrvTransaction PrvCommand 類別的新執行個體。

To promote consistency among .NET Framework data providers, name the inheriting class in the form where is the uniform prefix given to all classes in a specific .NET Framework data provider namespace. For example, is the prefix of the class in the namespace. When you inherit from the interface, you should implement the following constructors: Item Description
PrvCommand() Initializes a new instance of the PrvCommand class.
PrvCommand(string cmdText) Initializes a new instance of the PrvCommand class with the text of the query.
PrvCommand(string cmdText, PrvConnection connection) Initializes a new instance of the PrvCommand class with the text of the query and a PrvConnection.
PrvCommand(string cmdText, PrvConnection connection, PrvTransaction transaction) Initializes a new instance of the PrvCommand class with the text of the query, a PrvConnection, and the PrvTransaction.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Cancel() cil managed

span.span: Attempts to cancels the execution of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有取消，會發生任何事。If there is nothing to cancel, nothing happens. 不過，如果正在進行命令，而取消作業的嘗試失敗，則不會產生任何例外狀況 (Exception)。However, if there is a command in process, and the attempt to cancel fails, no exception is generated.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CommandText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CommandText : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要對資料來源執行的文字命令。

span.span: Gets or sets the text command to run against the data source.
The text command to execute.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`StoredProcedure`，將預存程序名稱的屬性。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, set the property to the name of the stored procedure. 使用者可能需要使用逸出字元語法，如果預存程序名稱包含任何特殊字元。The user may be required to use escape character syntax if the stored procedure name contains any special characters. 當您呼叫其中一個 Execute 方法時，命令會呼叫此預存程序。The command will call this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods. ## Examples 下列範例會建立在衍生類別的執行個體並設定其部分屬性。The following example creates an instance of a derived class, and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData IDbCommand.CommandText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData IDbCommand.CommandText Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData IDbCommand.CommandText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData IDbCommand.CommandText Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定結束執行命令的嘗試並產生錯誤之前的等待時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the wait time before terminating the attempt to execute a command and generating an error.

value.span: 等待命令執行的時間 (以秒為單位)。

span.span: The time (in seconds) to wait for the command to execute.
The default value is 30 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會建立在衍生類別的執行個體並設定其部分屬性。The following example creates an instance of a derived class, and sets some of its properties. summary.span: 指示或指定 屬性應如何解譯。

span.span: Indicates or specifies how the property is interpreted.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您設定屬性，以`StoredProcedure`，您應該設定預存程序名稱的屬性。When you set the property to `StoredProcedure`, you should set the property to the name of the stored procedure. 當您呼叫 Execute 方法的其中一個命令會執行這個預存程序。The command executes this stored procedure when you call one of the Execute methods.

span.span: Creates a new instance of an object.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當繼承自，.NET Framework 資料提供者實作的強型別版本。When inheriting from , a .NET Framework data provider implements a strongly-typed version of .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 ExecuteNonQuery() cil managed

summary.span: 針對 .NET Framework 資料提供者的 物件執行 SQL 陳述式，並傳回受影響的資料列數目。

span.span: Executes an SQL statement against the object of a .NET Framework data provider, and returns the number of rows affected.
The number of rows affected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用來執行資料庫目錄作業 （例如，查詢資料庫的結構或建立資料庫物件，例如資料表），或變更資料庫中的資料，而不需使用執行 UPDATE、 INSERT 或 DELETE陳述式。You can use the to perform catalog operations (for example, querying the structure of a database or creating database objects such as tables), or to change the data in a database without using a by executing UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE statements. 雖然不會傳回任何資料列，而任何輸出參數或傳回對應至參數的值會填入資料。Although the does not return any rows, any output parameters or return values mapped to parameters are populated with data. 對 UPDATE、INSERT 和 DELETE 陳述式而言，傳回值是受命令影響的資料列數目。For UPDATE, INSERT, and DELETE statements, the return value is the number of rows affected by the command. 對其他類型的陳述式而言，傳回值為 -1。For all other types of statements, the return value is -1. ## Examples 下列範例會建立衍生類別中的執行個體，然後執行它。The following example creates an instance of the derived class, , and then executes it. 若要這麼做，方法會傳遞為 SQL SELECT 陳述式的字串和要用來連接到資料來源的字串。To accomplish this, the method is passed a string that is a SQL SELECT statement and a string to use to connect to the data source. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.ExecuteNonQuery Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The connection does not exist.
-or- The connection is not open.
Executes the against the and builds an .

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: 針對 執行 ，並使用其中一個 值來建置 。

span.span: Executes the against the , and builds an using one of the values.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫端必須呼叫方法的屬性。The caller must call the method of the property. 當屬性設定為`StoredProcedure`，則屬性應設為預存程序的名稱。When the property is set to `StoredProcedure`, the property should be set to the name of the stored procedure. 命令執行這個預存程序，當您呼叫。The command executes this stored procedure when you call . > [!NOTE] > 使用以擷取較大的值和二進位資料。Use to retrieve large values and binary data. 否則，可能會發生，並將會關閉連接。Otherwise, an might occur and the connection will be closed. 雖然正在使用中，相關聯忙於處理。While the is in use, the associated is busy serving the . 處於此狀態時，沒有其他作業可對以外關閉它。While in this state, no other operations can be performed on the other than closing it. 此情況下，直到呼叫 DataReader 的方法。This is the case until the method of the DataReader is called. 如果使用建立 DataReader設定為`CloseConnection`，自動關閉 DataReader 關閉連接。If the DataReader is created with set to `CloseConnection`, closing the DataReader closes the connection automatically.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ExecuteScalar() cil managed

summary.span: 執行查詢，並傳回查詢所傳回的結果集中第一個資料列的第一個資料行。

span.span: Executes the query, and returns the first column of the first row in the resultset returned by the query.

summary.span: 額外的資料行或資料列都會遭到忽略。

span.span: Extra columns or rows are ignored.

returns.span: 結果集中第一個資料列的第一個資料行。

span.span: The first column of the first row in the resultset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以從資料庫中擷取單一值 （例如，彙總的值）。Use the method to retrieve a single value (for example, an aggregate value) from a database. 這需要較少的程式碼比使用方法，然後再執行 產生單一值所傳回的資料所需的作業。This requires less code than using the method, and then performing the operations necessary to generate the single value using the data returned by an . 一般查詢可以進行格式化，如下列 C# 範例所示：A typical query can be formatted as in the following C# example: ``` CommandText = "select count(*) as NumberOfRegions from region"; Int32 count = (int) ExecuteScalar(); ``` 如果結果集中的第一個資料列的第一個資料行找不到，為 null 參考 (`Nothing` Visual Basic 中) 會傳回。If the first column of the first row in the result set is not found, a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) is returned. 如果資料庫中的值是`null`，則查詢會傳回`DBNull.Value`。If the value in the database is `null`, the query returns `DBNull.Value`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立衍生類別中的執行個體，然後執行它使用。The following example creates an instance of the derived class, , and then executes it using . 此範例會傳遞為彙總的結果，傳回的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式的字串和要用來連接到資料來源的字串。The example is passed a string that is a Transact-SQL statement that returns an aggregate result, and a string to use to connect to the data source. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteScalar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteScalar/CS/mysample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteScalar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlCommand.ExecuteScalar/VB/mysample.vb#1)]

[!code-csharp[Classic WebData IDbCommand.Parameters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData IDbCommand.Parameters Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData IDbCommand.Parameters Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData IDbCommand.Parameters Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Prepare() cil managed

summary.span: 在資料來源上建立命令已備妥 (或已編譯) 的版本。

span.span: Creates a prepared (or compiled) version of the command on the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`TableDirect`，不執行任何動作。If the property is set to `TableDirect`, does nothing. 如果設定為`StoredProcedure`，以呼叫應該會成功，雖然可能會不導致執行任何作業。If is set to `StoredProcedure`, the call to should succeed, although it may result in a no-op. 伺服器會自動快取為必要的; 重複使用的計劃因此，不是需要直接在用戶端應用程式中呼叫這個方法。The server automatically caches plans for reuse as necessary; therefore, there is no need to call this method directly in your client application. ## Examples 下列範例會建立衍生類別中的執行個體，並開啟連接。The following example creates an instance of the derived class, , and opens the connection. 範例會藉由傳遞字串，這是 SQL Select 陳述式和字串，用來連接到資料來源，然後準備資料來源上的預存程序。The example then prepares a stored procedure on the data source by passing a string that is a SQL Select statement and a string to use to connect to the data source. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbCommand.Prepare Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
